group_1.textRight: Ummm, like...@Is this as loud as it goes?
Okay, got it... So I'm gonna like @pull down the screen now, 'kay?
Hey, Senpai!
I wanna make sure it's loud enough,@so can you like say something?

group_1.textLeft: ...Sure.@...Now I'm going to take the alum and...

group_1.textRight: No, no...@You need to talk louder!

group_1.textLeft: ...Okay.@If you observe the reaction, you'll see—

group_1.textRight: No, I mean, like, I dunno...@You're like a whole different person...
It should be like...
CHECK IT OUT!@BOOM! SCIENCE!
See what I mean?
Don't I do like a totally awesome @job of imitating you, Myako-senpai?
It's like, exactly like you, right?

group_1.textLeft: ...Now in our next experiment, we'll be—

group_1.textRight: Ugh, like did you even @like hear a word I said?
You gotta like... I dunno...@Cheer up or something!
Tell ya what!@I'll put together like a group date thing.
I'll invite a whole bunch of super cute@guys, okay?

group_1.textLeft: ...A catalyst is needed in order to@accelerate the reaction—

group_1.textRight: Anyway, if he turned you down just 'cause @of the way you look, who needs him anyway?
Like they say, men are just like fish!
Plenty of 'em in the sea, right?
Like I mean, I dunno exactly, but like...
There's probably like, I dunno...@A billion of 'em?
So don't worry about it, 'kay?@You can always catch another one!
The whole babyface thing ya got going on...?
I think it totally works for you!@There are guys really into that—
Yikes! @Did I go too far?

group_1.textLeft: Social life?! Broken heart?!@Blow 'em to pieces with ethanol!
And your fish thing? There are more@than 10 billion sardines caught per year!
When men look at me, all they @see is a short, flat-chested...

group_1.textRight: Whoa...!@Listen to that howl...!
I get the feeling this is @gonna go on for a while...
